body_html:
`Last login: Wed Dec 13 21:47:27 on ttys001
➜ ~ ls /usr/local/cuda/include/ | grep cudnn
cudnn.h
➜ ~ ls /usr/local/cuda/lib/ | grep cudnn
libcudnn.6.dylib
libcudnn_static.a
➜ ~

`

for some reason libcudnn.dylib is missing.

fixed:

➜ ~ ls /usr/local/cuda/include/ | grep cudnn cudnn.h ➜ ~ ls /usr/local/cuda/lib/ | grep cudnn libcudnn.6.dylib libcudnn.dylib libcudnn_static.a ➜ ~

and the build failing again:

`pytorch git:(master) MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.13.2 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python3 setup.py install
running install
running build_deps
-- Automatic GPU detection failed. Building for common architectures.

`Last login: Wed Dec 13 21:47:27 on ttys001
